title: Yum
text: Amazing burgers! Especially the one with truffels in it. Very central location in firostefani, and some of the best food we found

title: Awful!
text: What a horrible experience. Clogged toilets from already half way over. Toilet water floating inside the cabin. Filthy and run down boat. Got no words. Never again.

title: Awful drinks
text: The food at hard rock is always amazing. The drinks on this place on the otherhand.. no, just no. Ended up leaving them almost untouched. The Orange one was seriously one of the worst we have ever tasted. The drinks are usually so good at hard rock, but this place seriously needs to learn their recipies!!

title: Neh...
text: The pictures and sound of this place was much better than the reality. Not that much of an selection. And the ice cream was not the best, except for pictures, we actually ended up throwing it..

title: Dissapointing
text: This place was a bit dissapointing. So much rehabilitating on the buildings and actually not all that much to see.

title: Good
text: Went up for dinner as we stayed at the hotel. Food was very good, and the view at night was amazing!

title: Nice
text: This was a great hotel, but it could be so much more. The curtains had spots and there were Lots of scratches on the interior that ruined the impression a little bit. But all in all, very pleased! Be sure to check out the restaurant and bar at the top, amazing view over acropolis.

title: No
text:
Went here to try one of the crazy flavours this time, but the concept of the chaos at this place almost made us give up again.
The is had plenty of ice crystals in it, not good. And the staff, seriously would it kill you to brighten up a bit?!

title: Very good to be in the centre
text: There is rarely the best food finds in the city centre, but this place actually surprised us positively.

title: The best gelato in rome
text: Even though we lived on the other side of the town we had to take the trip up to this gelato. Still the best we ever had in rome. Simply amazing!

title: Still ok
text: Good food, Even though I need to say it's not as good as a couple of years ago. The lasagna is sooooo good.

title: A must
text: A bottle of wine, tiramisu and a table looking over the pantheon. è magnifico! Foodwise.. ok, but not all that.

title: Our favourite in Rome
text: Yet again we made sure to get a table at la botticella our last night in rome. This place is amazing. Can't wait to come back!

title: Overrated
text: Was really excited to go to this place, but unfortuantely its really overrated. Definitely not the best tiramisu we have had, as its way to creamy. But they havr many flavour options

title: Nightlife
text: A different athmosphere than inside the city centre, but the place comes to life at nighttime with its many popular restaurants and bars.

title: Just ok
text: Even though its no longer allowed to sit in the steps, the crowd is still crazy. I actually liked it better when you could sit and relax here, than just walk in chaos

title: The must see in rome
text: Pantheon at night is one of romes best sights. The athmosphere is just simply amazing. Take a trip inside and see the amazing dome

title: Magical
text: Still one of the most magical places i know of. Was lucky enough to be there just as the rain started pouring down, and the entire crowd dissapeared.

title: Surprisingly dissapointing
text: From seeing the pictures it was a big suprise to see the room. The bathroom had sloppy work done, and the towel hangers kept falling off, as did the showerhead who wasnt fasten securely. And the concept of open bathroom glass wall into the bed, just dont go here on your first cuple vacation.. small room and very dark and small entrance. Seen worse, but definitely not the best. Good location, thats a plus!
